game.name: Forza Motorsport
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 커리어에서 경쟁에서 앞서가세요. 멀티플레이어를 통해 세계에서 경주를 펼치세요. 세계적으로 유명한 27개의 트랙에서 500대 이상의 차량으로 경쟁하세요. 이제 짜릿한 뉘르부르크링 노르트슐라이페 코스도 포함되었습니다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Compete in over 500 cars on 30 world-famous tracks – now featuring the legendary Fujimi Kaido! Play the new 20th Anniversary Tour and obtain special rewards.

reviewHighlights.text: Game released with a poor performance that took nearly a year to get stable enough, not only that after 2 years of measly content they have ended the...
I think this is honestly the first time I have seen that a game being killed actually made it better as a result. To say I am not a fan of Live Servic...
